title: The Emerald Sceptre
description: The last in the trilogy of Forgotten Realms novels from Thomas M. Reid.This is the concluding novel in a trilogy exploring the political intrigue of a mercenary society in the Forgotten Realms world. Author Thomas M. Reid has written the entire trilogy, which takes place in an area of the world little before explored in novels.AUTHOR THOMAS M. REID held numerous positions with TSR and Wizards of the Coast, Inc., including brand manager for the D&D ® brand and creative director for Star Wars ® RPGs. Besides the Scions of Arrabar trilogy, his most recent novel is Insurrection , the second book in the New York Times best-selling R.A. Salvatore’s War of the Spider Queen series.
